page.title: 06MILLBROOK VILLAGE(CON.)
page.content: There is a bakers,a betting shop, a butchers ,two fish &chip shops,a greengrocers,a grocers,two hairdressers,an ironmongers,an off-license and a newsagents.One of the fish-shops"Lee Garden" is Chinese owned and the off-license belongs to an Indian Mr.Mistry. The are includes four farms ,Sun Green Farm,Lower Hyde Green Farm and Cooper Farm which lie at the top of Besom Lane and Staley Hall Farm at the end of Howard Street. There are two schools in the village St.Raphael R.C.Primary and Millbrook Primary.Millbrook County Primary School was built in 1974 and is a modern open plan building.It was built to replace St.James C.E.School which is now used as a Youth and Community Centre .There are 61 children in the Nursery.In the Infants
